The flying and fire types cancel out. she takes average damage. Plus kayle knows the move protect so she's fine against Lux. Vel's really good vs fighters ironically....his counter is dark ({{champion:238}} ) types as well....fishy if you ask me.

Yeah, she's definitely a UU mon, she's definitely stronger beats weaker mons {{champion:429}} {{champion:30}}  with her type diversity but she lacks the base stats to compete with OU's greatest {{champion:34}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:85}}. She either gets walled (he he) out or outclassed by most OU mons. 

Personally I'd use her as a glass cannon, all-out attacker. I'd put 252 ev's into her ability power, 126 ev's in HP per level and 126 in movement speed. Let her hold a salac berry so that when she survives with her extra hp, she can sweep the enemy team. Give her Wide Guard for utility, Grass Knot to help her take out walls like {{champion:54}}  as well as some of her other counters, Whirlpool to keep ground and rock type threats like {{champion:421}} {{champion:3}} trapped with her and Hyper Beam to 1-shot squishy threats like {{champion:1}} {{champion:69}}.
Why not go for a useful stab attack instead of Hyper beam tho? Only 15 base power less on FT/TB/IB :o
